animeTitle: Kaleido Star: Legend of Phoenix - Layla Hamilton Monogatari
animeDescription: Layla is going to perform Phoenix in Broadway. Playing this important role, she sets out on a journey by bicycle alone without leaving any message in order to find out what she's missing inside.
